data.message: Dear facebook when I go into all of my facebook games now there are three different kinds of games now there are Instant games along with your games and there is recemended games and there are only supposed to be the reccomended games and your games when you go into the games on facebook so something is really messed up with the way that facebook has the games now because there are only supposed to be two different sets the ones with your games on it and the recommended games you don't need the Instant games added to that list please take out the Instant games because people don't use the Instant games on facebook at all and please remove the instant games apps ASAP! meaning right away!
